name: CON
description:
Classy, classy eyewear for the discerning gentleman 
 - Products include: 1 glasses + 1 glasses case + cleaning cloth + brand card 
 - Color: black, water spinach green, tea brown 
 - Dimensions: 55mm x 20mm 
 - Frames are designed with 3-layer electrostatically plated multi-element alloy. Anti-oxidation in all environments 
 - Lenses are made of high-grade lenses with UV protection, glare removal, shatterproof, scratch-resistant to help you see more clearly when on the road.
